infotexts.entitydescription.skylight: If the light cuts out when standing in a corner, use hexagon sky light. A very bright and matte light that becomes invisible once the game starts.
infotexts.entitydescription.skylighthex: Use this light if you encounter problems with the square light vanishing when standing near the corner of it. A very bright and matte light that becomes invisible once the game starts.
infotexts.entitydescription.spawner: A simple item/creature spawner that can be wired. If you find the EntitySpawner confusing just lower the condition of this item to 0 to see detailed instructions. If you plan on using the EntitySpawnerComponent at the bottom then leave the CustomInterface blank, if you use the CustomInterface then leave EntitySpawnerComponent blank.
